title: 【Cashier Section】The tuition and miscellaneous fees payment form for the first semester of 2023 academic year can be downloaded from August 21!
author: 鄧瑞美
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處出納組 - 鄧瑞美 - deng@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906366
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Cashier Section】The tuition and miscellaneous fees payment form for the first semester of 2023 academic year can be downloaded from August 21!
日期： Fri, 18 Aug 2023 12:41:53 +0800

Dear students
The tuition and miscellaneous fee payment form for the first semester of 2023 academic year can be downloaded now! The tuition and miscellaneous fees should be paid between August 21, 2023 and September 12, 2023.

Please visit the portal for tuitions and miscellaneous fees of the Bank of Taiwan to download and print out the payment form (link:https://school.bot.com.tw/ )

If you have questions regarding course selection, please contact Ms. Ta in Curriculum Division of Academic Affairs Office at 03-8906123.

If you have questions regarding Student Dormitory Application, please contact Ms. Chen in Student Living Services Division Office of Student Affairs Office at 03-8906212.

If you have question regarding payment, please contact Ms. Deng in Cashier Disivion of General Affairs Office at 03-8906366.

Best regards,
The Cashier Section of the Office of General Affairs
August 18, 2023
